title: Sufi Lofi - 25 Min Spiritual Focus Music | Pravos Deep Work Sessions
description:
Experience Sufi Lofi - a 25-minute spiritual lofi journey designed for deep focus and contemplative work.

Pravos (www.pravos.xyz) was born from frustration with fragmented focus tools. I wanted one clean workspace that supported deep work without demanding attention. Music, timer, tasks - unified and quiet.

This album blends Sufi-inspired melodies with lofi beats. The same intentional arc as all Pravos music: settling, building, sustaining, releasing.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz
